WDK and Visual Studio build environment

p.caps_html_text_node: Specifies the prefix to use for the global variables and functions defined in the generated header file (same as the
Generates code that is binary compatible with versions of Windows prior to Windows 7 (same as the
Reverts to generating code using Windows Vista code templates. This option causes
to generate four output files: two header files (.h, _r.h), a resource file (.rc), and a source code file (c). (
Generate header file for containing counter names and GUIDs

td.p: Creates a header file that assigns symbols to the counter set names and GUIDs for each counter set in the manifest.
Specifies the name of the header file that the tool generates. If you do not specify a path, the file is generated in the current folder.
Specifies the name of the resource file that the tool generates. If you do not specify a path, the file is generated in the current folder.

p.caps_html_text_node: Generates a binary counter file per provider. (

td.p: Generates a summary global file GenSumResource.BIN.

p.caps_html_text_node: Specifies the path to generate binary counter files. (

td.p: If no path is specified, the current directory is used.

p.caps_html_text_node: Generates a header file for containing counter names and ids. (
Generates a header file for the provider. It replaces the default name. (
Specifies the name for the resource file. This replaces the default name. (
